sqlMap.statement: SELECT COA_SEG_LKUP_TP_CD FROM COA_SEG_LKUP_TP WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# ORDER BY COA_SEG_LKUP_TP_SORT_NUM
SELECT EZUPTIME , EZUPTIMEZONE , ELIG_COA_SEG_PTRN_CD , COA_SEG_LKUP_TP_CD FROM ELIG_COA_SEG_PTRN WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# ORDER BY ELIG_COA_SEG_PTRN_CD
SELECT 1 FROM ELIG_COA_SEG_PTRN WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ELIG_COA_SEG_PTRN_CD = #eligCoaSegPtrnCd# AND COA_SEG_LKUP_TP_CD = #coaSegLkupTpCd#
